awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 3 nominations.

fullplot: After a terrible air disaster, survivor Max Klein emerges a changed person. Unable to connect to his former life or to wife Laura, he feels godlike and invulnerable. When psychologist Bill Perlman is unable to help Max, he has Max meet another survivor, Carla Rodrigo, who is racked with grief and guilt since her baby died in the crash which she and Max survived.
plot: A man's personality is dramatically changed after surviving a major airline crash.
title: Fearless

tomatoes.consensus: This underrated gem from director Peter Weir features an outstanding performance from Jeff Bridges as a man dealing with profound grief.
